metadata.title: Perform in situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) staining

params.note: In situ hybridization chain reaction (HCR) staining confirmed the presence of more retinal progenitors (SFRP2+) at lower RA concentrations and more ventralized and posterior fates (FOXA2+) at higher RA concentrations (Fig. 2d and Extended Data Fig. 3l,m).
